Class Card

extends java.lang.Object
    An immutable class for representing Hanabi cards

      • shuffledDeck

        public static java.util.Stack<Card> shuffledDeck()
        Gives a new instance of a shuffled deck of cards deck of cards. Pairs of random cards are swapped 100 times, and placed into a stack.
        Returns:
        a stack of Hanabi cards in random order
